item.description: OK so some of you know I volunteer for FMAS (manchester animal shelter) I am really involved with this event and would LOVE to see some of you there... Here are the details! Join us for a day filled with fun while helping to raise money for the Friends of Manchester Animal Shelter Free giftbag for first 150 pre registered for MUTT STRUTT! $15.00 for owner and dog for Mutt Strutt Free to attend the Responsible Pet Owners Day First 150 to register for the Mutt Strutt will receive a Mutt Strutt Gift Bag! Registration for Mutt Strutt 9:00 - 9:45am. Walk begins at 10:00am. Responsible Pet Owner's Day will be open 9:00 to 2:00pm The event will be held rain or shine! Get Ready for a Great Time!!! Join us for a fun day while helping to raise money for the Friends of Manchester Animal Shelter! Walk in our Mutt Strutt (around doors pond all dogs on leash) with your dog, check out our vendors, play some games, pet photo's, pet psychic and so much more! here's a link to the registration page http://fmas.homestead... OR you can register at the event but remember only the FIRST 150 registrants get a goodie bag and they are VERY COOL! Hope to see you there! I'll be there!!!  here's a link to the mutt strutt site!  http://fmas.homestead.com/muttstrutt2011.html

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Manchester Animal Shelter's Annual Mutt Strutt and responsible pet owners day
